data.change_log: v0.2 General code tidyup and added GET to find the checkin/out status and dates where applicable. v0.3 Modified plugin to use new class in Jomres. v0.4 French language file added. v1.0 API plugins updated to work with updates to Jomres, and some tweaks for consistency.
